casebody.data:
HAIYING TAO, et al.
v.
COURT OF PROBATE, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 6, 2017

Keith M. Curran, self-represented, in support of the petition.

*802The plaintiff Keith M. Curran's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 38833) is denied.

ROBINSON and MULLINS, Js., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
